header.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an action in football in which you hit the ball with your head
header.translation[0].definitions[1].def: information at the top of a page, especially things such as numbers that appear on each page of a document
header.translation[0].definitions[2].def: information at the beginning of an email message that shows when it was sent, who wrote it etc
header.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the line of information at the top of a computer screen or a printed page
